text: Sonneberg is a German city in the south of Thuringia. The nearest large city is Coburg. The population of Sonneberg is about 20,000 people. The mayor of the city is Sibylle Abel. ==Sister cities== * , Göppingen * , Neustadt bei Coburg ==Sights== ===Museums=== * Schlauaquarium Nautiland * Heimattiergarten * German Toy Museum * Astronomiemuseum ===Buildings=== * Sternwarte * Citychurch St.Peter * Militarychuch St. Aegidien * Old City hall * New City hall * House of AOK * Main station ==Regular meetings== * International Jazz Days of Sonneberg * Sonneberger Vogelschießen * Sonneberger Kneipenfest * Sonneberger Musikmeile * Doll Theater Weeks * International Doll Festival (with Neustadt bei Coburg) * City festival ==Traffic== * B 89 Konach-Meiningen * A 73 Nürnberg-Coburg-Suhl about away from Sonneberg there is the Connectionpoint Neustadt bei Coburg-Sonneberg. It is next to Coburg. * With the train to Coburg and to Eisenach * Next airports in Coburg and Suhl ==References== Category:Sonneberg Rural District
title: Sonneberg
